\section{Executive Summary}

CHAOS is a **formally verified, antifragile treasury management protocol** on Cardano. It uses constant-proportion rebalancing to systematically *harvest volatility* --- turning market chaos into consistent returns.

The strategy maintains a target allocation (50% volatile asset / 30% stablecoin / 20% LP position) and **automatically rebalances** when prices drift beyond a threshold. This generates a mathematically proven return premium proportional to $\sigma^2$.

**Higher volatility = higher returns.** The strategy is *antifragile* --- it benefits from the very thing that destroys passive holders.

\vspace{4pt}

\section{Mathematical Foundation}

The strategy rests on four theorems --- all \textbf{formally verified in Lean~4} (12 proofs, zero \texttt{sorry}). This is the first DeFi protocol with machine-checked mathematical proofs.

\vspace{6pt}

\begin{center}
{\small
\begin{tabularx}{\linewidth}{c l X c}
\toprule
\textbf{\#} & \textbf{Theorem} & \textbf{Result} & \textbf{Status} \\
\midrule
1 & Positive expected value & Rebalancing premium $>$ costs when $\sigma > 25.5\%$ & \textcolor{green}{\bfseries Proved} \\
2 & Bounded drawdown & CHAOS DD $\leq$ 64\% of asset DD & \textcolor{green}{\bfseries Proved} \\
3 & LP fee floor & $\geq$ 3\% annual return from fees alone & \textcolor{green}{\bfseries Proved} \\
4 & Convex payoff & Strategy \textit{gains} from volatility (antifragile) & \textcolor{green}{\bfseries Proved} \\
\bottomrule
\end{tabularx}
}
\end{center}

\vspace{4pt}

\textbf{Stress-tested against 8 Black Swan events} (COVID crash, Terra/LUNA, FTX, flash crashes, 18-month bear market):
Drawdown bound holds \textbf{8/8}, LP floor holds \textbf{8/8}, excess return holds \textbf{7/8} (fails only when vol collapses below threshold --- by design).

\smallskip
\begingroup\small
\noindent Crypto annualized volatility: ADA \raise.17ex\hbox{\textasciitilde}85\%, BTC \raise.17ex\hbox{\textasciitilde}60\%, ETH \raise.17ex\hbox{\textasciitilde}75\%. All well above the 25.5\% break-even threshold. The strategy's edge \textit{increases} with volatility --- the opposite of traditional finance.
\endgroup

\subsection{Top Risks}

{\small
\begin{enumerate}
  \item \textbf{Regulatory action} (40\% weight) --- mitigated by offshore entity, progressive decentralization
  \item \textbf{Bull underperformance} (35\%) --- by design; disclosed upfront
  \item \textbf{Smart contract bugs} (15\%) --- mitigated by multiple audits, formal verification, TVL caps
  \item \textbf{Oracle failure} (10\%) --- mitigated by 4-source consensus, circuit breakers
\end{enumerate}
}

\columnbreak

\subsection{Risk Mitigations}

{\small
\begin{itemize}
  \item Circuit breakers: auto-pause on $>$20\% oracle deviation
  \item TVL caps: phased rollout (\$1M $\to$ \$10M $\to$ uncapped)
  \item Insurance: 5\% of treasury reserved for exploit coverage
  \item Governance: parameter changes require 7-day timelock
  \item Audits: 2 independent firms pre-launch
\end{itemize}
}

\end{multicols}
